dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Copyright Infringement on your server!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 10, 2006 8:46 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Copyright Infringement on your server!

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, February 09,
2006 at
10:30:25 PM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] URGENT: Copyright Infringement on your server!

MESSAGE BODY:
Hello, I am the owner of a website called:  talkgold.com I have been
contacted by several of our forum members about a site called talkqold.com
(q in the place of the g), who has an exact replica of our site on your
server.  He is using his site to phish for our user's passwords, and has our
site showing on this domain name.  Please remove this site from your servers
immediately, and let me know if there is anything else I should do.
This guy has hacked hundreds of our members accounts through phishing
attempts via your server.

Brian Krassenstein
 Talkgold.com <http://talkgold.com/>


RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1F7PvT-00066d-G0; Thu, 09 Feb 2006 22:30:31 -0600

        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1F7PvR-00066S-Gx
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 09 Feb 2006 22:30:29 -0600
